entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon then west 50 gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
